page.title: 14HOUSE TYPES IN NESTON AREA
page.content: In{Parkgate}we have private detached and semi-detached houses and bungalows. Many roads are tree-lined. In{Neston}there are some more private houses of this type and some older terraced housing, some of it in the local sandstone. There are also very many council houses, in terraces or semi-detached. Gardens are smaller and there are less trees. In{Thornton Hough}there are two areas. The main village was planned as a unit by the first{Lord Leverhulme} and is a pleasant combination of styles and materials, using traditional Cheshire black & white designs as a start, and having a Dutch influence. There is also a modern private housing development. In{Gayton}the housing is all private, much of it being detached.
